channel.title: Kid gets.. traffic cone stuck to his head?
channel.description:
To Charlie Thomas, it must have seemed like a wizard idea. Spotting a discarded traffic cone, the imaginative three-year-old immediately saw its potential as an impromptu Harry Potter outfit. But after placing it carefully on his head to show his family, the magic soon disappeared. The plastic cone became firmly stuck and despite the best efforts of the toddler's parents, it refused to budge.
[img]http://img.dailymail.co.uk/i/pix/2007/10_04/cthomasmumDM2210a_468x397.jpg[/img] 8 Firefighters to get it out.. [img]http://img.dailymail.co.uk/i/pix/2007/10_03/CharlieThomasSWNS_468x351.jpg[/img]

item.title: Kid gets.. traffic cone stuck to his head?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

AHAHAHAAHA i love when kids get stuck, or get stuff stuck to them… just cracks me up.

Like someone posted here before about a kid getting stuck in a toy vending machine of some sort.
Also i saw a video of some kid who got his head stuck to a plastic chair

ahhhh i demand moar!
